features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication functionality including Login and Registration for Customers and Sellers.

features.name: Home Screen
features.description: Main landing screen for customers displaying featured parts, categories, brands, and search entry.

features.name: Part Details
features.description: Detailed view of a specific car part including images, price, seller info, and status.

features.name: Search & Discovery
features.description: Functionality to search for parts with filters and view results.

features.name: Favorites
features.description: Screen to view and manage favorited parts.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Application navigation structure enabling movement between screens.

features.name: API Service
features.description: Centralized service for handling all API requests to the backend.
